headline: Schwab Trading Activity Index™: Cautious Optimism in July as STAX Score Edges Upward
summary: WESTLAKE, Texas, August 04, 2025--The Schwab Trading Activity Index™ (STAX) increased to 41.79 in July, up from its score of 40.66 in June. The only index of its kind, the STAX is a proprietary, behavior-based index that analyzes retail investor stock positions and trading activity from Schwab’s millions of client accounts to illuminate what investors were actually doing and how they were positioned in the markets each month.
